name: market for clay brick | clay brick | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/29412/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This market represents 'clay brick, extruded' for construction in Ecuador. In this market, expert judgement was used to develop product specific transport distance estimations. Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;The product 'clay brick' represents bricks with clay as the main primary material. The produced bricks have an average weight of 6.06 kg (extruded) / 4.72 kg (moulded) and average dimensions of (19.5 x 38 x 12.5) cm (extruded) / (13.5 x 26.5 x 7.75) cm (moulded) (width x length x height).(width x length x height), with 6 cavities of (4.75 x 5.25) cm.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'clay brick', within the geography of Ecuador.

This activity ends with the supply of 'clay brick', to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2392:Manufacture of clay building materials

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Time period was set identical to the corresponding transformation activity.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Transportation distance and truck type based on expert opinion specific for Ecuador.

exchanges.description: Transportation distance and truck type based on expert opinion. Transport was calculated as a weighted average of the transport distances of each type of clay brick and their production volume shares. Extruded: 84.53 km / 1.2672E+09 kg/a. Moulded: 50.28 km / 8.4016E+09 kg/a.
